description:
Non-material amendment to planning consent ref: P2021/1775/FUL dated 23/11/2021 which sought permission for: Proposed demolition of existing mansard storey and roof level plant installation and erection of a replacement fifth floor, new sixth floor and mechanical plant at roof level with acoustic screening. Plus extensions at first to fourth floor to the River House rear elevation on Crawford Passage (including third to fifth floor balconies) and use of the first-floor rear flat roofs as amenity terraces along with amendments to the ground level facade to facilitate new internal configuration. 

Amendments propose: An amendment to the development description to read: Proposed demolition of existing mansard storey and roof level plant installation and erection of a replacement fifth floor, new sixth floor, roof terrace with associated stair, lift access and WCs and mechanical plant at roof level with acoustic screening. Plus extensions at first to fourth floor to the River House rear elevation on Crawford Passage (including third to fifth floor balconies) and use of the first floor rear flat roofs as amenity terraces along with amendments to the ground level facade to facilitate new internal configuration.
